info.title: ETH RPC NodeChain API
info.description: Docs relating to the ETH RPC API, including the connection to the API of the native node. Its goal is to give the user an easy way to be able to raise their own nodes for use with the native Swapper application.

post.summary: Return the balance of any address
post.description: Return the balance of any address

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getAddressBalance

post.summary: Return the balance of an array of addresses
post.description: Return the balance of an array of addresses

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getAddressesBalance

post.description: Returns latest block hash and index
post.summary: Returns latest block hash and index

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getHeight

post.summary: Returns the current price per gas in wei.
post.description: Returns the current price per gas in wei.

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getGasPrice

post.description: Returns True if blocks are syncing and returns False if theres no synchronization or is fully sychronize

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be syncing

post.summary: Broadcast a transaction to the network
post.description: Broadcast a transaction to the network

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be broadcastTransaction

post.summary: Generates and returns an estimate of how much gas is necessary to allow the transaction to complete
post.description: The transaction will not be added to the blockchain. Note that the estimate may be significantly more than the amount of gas actually used by the transaction, for a variety of reasons including EVM mechanics and node performance.

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be estimateGas

post.description: Returns the information of any block giving its hash
post.summary: Returns the information of any block giving its hash

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getBlockByHash

post.description: Returns the information of any block giving its height
post.summary: Returns the information of any block giving its height

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getBlockByNumber

post.summary: Returns the number of success/pending transactions of any address
post.description: Returns the number of success/pending transactions of any address

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getAddressTransactionCount

post.summary: Returns the number of success/pending transactions of an array of address
post.description: Returns the number of success/pending transactions of an array of any address

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getAddressesTransactionCount

post.summary: Returns the receipt of a transaction by transaction hash
post.description: Returns the receipt of a transaction by transaction hash

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getTransactionReceipt

post.summary: Returns the transaction info given its hash
post.description: Returns the transaction info given its hash

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getTransaction

post.summary: Returns the transactions info given an array of transaction hashes
post.description: Returns the transactions info given an array of transaction hashes

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getTransaction

post.summary: Executes a new message call immediately without creating a transaction on the block chain
post.description: Executes a new message call immediately without creating a transaction on the block chain

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be call

post.summary: Get transaction history of an address

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getAddressHistory

post.summary: Get transaction history of an array of address
post.description: Get transaction history of an array of addresses

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be getAddressesHistory

post.summary: Returns the info of the transaction indexing process.
post.description: Returns the info of the transaction indexing process.

method.description: Method name to be called. For this operation, the field value must be indexing
